caption.p: Number of erythrocyte clusters and of individual erythrocytes visualized per CCi section in control and transgenic mice used to ablate Nkx2.1-derived or only NG2+ cells. The values (mean ± SEM) corresponding to the number of erythrocyte clusters and the number of individual erythrocytes per CCi are given for: (1) Nkx2.1-cre+/Rosa-DTA mice and their corresponding control Nkx2.1-cre-/Rosa-DTA mice, and (2) Cspg4-cre+/Rosa-DTA mice and their corresponding control Cspg4-cre-/Rosa-DTA mice (n=5 each; unpaired Student’s t-test).
